article_title: Christmas 1914: 2,000 children rush downtown to see Santa
article_text:

article_metadata.author: Lorna Thackeray

og.description: Thousands of people — most of the population of Billings — rollicked 'round a 30-foot Christmas tree covered with 500 multicolored electric globes on Christmas morning a century ago.
